high_descs: Turn around and walk over to the right-hand side of the bathroom counter.
Take the red rag out of the far right cabinet before closing the door.
Place the rag in the right-hand sink.
anns.task_desc: Place a rag in one of the bathroom sinks.

high_descs: Turn around and face the cabinet below the sink and on the far right.
Open the cabinet under the sink and on the far right and pick up the red cloth.
Put the cloth in the sink.
anns.task_desc: Put a cloth in a sink.

high_descs: Turn around and walk across the room to the sink on the right.
Take the red cloth out of the right lower cabinet.
Put the cloth into the sink.
anns.task_desc: Put a red cloth into the sink.
